General.Name: Macrolink Real Estate Co Ltd
General.Description: Macrolink Culturaltainment Development Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of real estate properties in China, South Korea, Malaysia, Australia, and internationally. The company is involved in cultural and tourism scenic spots, construction, hotel management, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China. Macrolink Culturaltainment Development Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Macrolink Holding Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Macrolink Group Headquarters Building, Beijing, China, 101116
